entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kinngait
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -35.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kinngait (Cape Dorset Airport) 4:55 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -35.4°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -39.1°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
